Html:
Hi evrybody,

I'm Zhamon, elemental shaman on Sargeras (EU)

 

I need an explanation about the Optimizer because when i make an optimization, the result bothers me.

In facts the new  optimized gear doesn't contain any ring(and sometines one trinket is missing ). And if i load the Optimized gear and i replace the missing ring(or the missing trinket) , my dps drop.

 

I would like to know how to fit out a ring can drop my dps(when no rings are equiped)??

 

Thx ,

 

Zhamon
The optimizer only shows the gear being replaced with another item, for increased DPS. It will not show items that you should keep wearing, as that would just introduce clutter to the screen.
I think it sounds more like he's just not marking things available. Zhamon, see Help > Gear Optimization.

devwar, it's not the problem. The problem is that when i click on "equip customized gear", my new gear have'nt ring and when i fill out this ring with my new gear optimized, my dps drop.

 

OK astrylian.
